caption: Super Fast
description: This bot has really fast response timing on top of having a lot of unique features

caption: High Quality Music
description: On top of us supporting playing music from Spotify, we also provide the music from our high quality music servers

caption: Highly Customizable
description: You can customize almost everything on this bot, from the embed colors to custom commands

caption: Reminders
description: Remind yourself of everything, this can be either in your dms or in a text channel

caption: Moderation
description: With our strong moderation features your moderators are sure to have a great time moderating your server

caption: Open source
description: No hidden backdoors in the bot, our code is open source so that you can see how secure it is

caption: Cute animals
description: With plenty of animal commands we're sure to have one you like and if not, just tell us to add it

caption: Chat bot
description: You will be able to get a good laugh with out AI powered chat bot

caption: Image commands
description: Change images to many things with our cool image commands
